snowmobile.snowmobileHeroDesc: Feel the rush of driving your own snowmobile across untouched winter landscapes together with local guides who know every trail.
snowmobile.snowmobileIntroHeading: Ride where only snowmobiles can go
snowmobile.snowmobileIntroPara1: We tailor every tour to the day
snowmobile.snowmobileClosingDesc: Reserve your snowmobile safari and let us design a Lapland adventure that matches your pace and interests.
snowmobile.snowmobileFeature1Desc: Professionals with avalanche and first-aid training lead every departure.
snowmobile.snowmobileFeature2Desc: Reach frozen lakes, hidden valleys and panoramic viewpoints.
snowmobile.snowmobileFeature3Desc: Choose half-day, full-day or multi-day expeditions.
snowmobile.snowmobileFeature4Desc: Plenty of stops to capture the northern scenery and your ride.
snowmobile.snowmobileStep1Desc: Meet your guide, review safety and change into thermal gear.
snowmobile.snowmobileStep2Desc: Follow our private trails across lakes and into the forest.
snowmobile.snowmobileStep3Desc: Enjoy a hot meal cooked over the fire in our timber hut.
snowmobile.snowmobileStep4Desc: Capture the final views before cruising back to base.

northernLights.northernLightsHeroDesc: Stand beneath the dancing aurora and capture the moment with guides who grew up under these skies.
northernLights.northernLightsIntroHeading: Follow the colours across the sky
northernLights.northernLightsIntroPara1: We monitor several weather models and solar forecasts to take you where the skies are clearest each night.
northernLights.northernLightsIntroPara2: Stay warm in our kota hut with open fire, reindeer hides and hot lingonberry juice while we wait for the show.
northernLights.northernLightsClosingDesc: Share your travel dates and we will recommend the best night for your northern lights tour.
northernLights.northernLightsFeature1Desc: Daily analysis of KP index, cloud cover and local micro climates.
northernLights.northernLightsFeature2Desc: Tripods and manual camera settings help from our in-house photographer.
northernLights.northernLightsFeature3Desc: Thermal suits, boots and hand warmers included for every guest.
northernLights.northernLightsFeature4Desc: Travel by minibus, snowmobile or snowshoes depending on conditions.
northernLights.northernLightsStep1Desc: Gather at base camp, gear up and review the forecast.
northernLights.northernLightsStep2Desc: Drive 30-60 minutes to the best aurora window of the night.
northernLights.northernLightsStep3Desc: Enjoy the lights from our heated shelter or outside on the snow.
northernLights.northernLightsStep4Desc: Capture portraits and tips for shooting the lights yourself.

dogSledding.dogSleddingHeroDesc: Partner with our friendly Siberian huskies and glide through Lapland
dogSledding.dogSleddingClosingDesc: Plan your dog sledding adventure in Lapland and let us match the perfect tour to your group.
dogSledding.dogSleddingFeature1Desc: Friendly, energetic dogs that love to run and be cuddled afterwards.
dogSledding.dogSleddingFeature2Desc: Guide-led routes through forests, over lakes and along ridgelines.
dogSledding.dogSleddingFeature3Desc: Private tours for families and friends with two guests per sled.
dogSledding.dogSleddingFeature4Desc: Learn about our training routine and how we care for the pack all year.
dogSledding.dogSleddingStep1Desc: Arrive at the kennel, meet the team and change into winter gear.
dogSledding.dogSleddingStep2Desc: Learn commands, braking and turning together with your guide.
dogSledding.dogSleddingStep3Desc: Drive your sled or relax as a passenger while the dogs run.
dogSledding.dogSleddingStep4Desc: Warm drinks, local pastries and time to cuddle the huskies.

lodging.lodgingHeroDesc: Sleep in our historic village schoolhouse converted into cosy apartments with access to sauna, hot tub and shared lounge.
lodging.lodgingIntroPara1: Each apartment includes a private bedroom loft, living space and kitchenette so you can unwind exactly the way you prefer.
lodging.lodgingIntroPara2: We prepare breakfast, lunch and dinner with locally sourced ingredients and can adapt menus for any dietary needs.
lodging.lodgingClosingDesc: Tell us how you like to travel and we will tailor a stay that balances adventure and comfort.
lodging.lodgingFeature1Desc: Two-bedroom apartments with space for up to six guests.
lodging.lodgingFeature2Desc: Wood-fired sauna, outdoor hot tub and relaxation lounge.
lodging.lodgingFeature3Desc: Heated drying room keeps your gear ready for the next outing.
lodging.lodgingFeature4Desc: Full-board dining with local ingredients and homemade treats.
lodging.lodgingStep1Desc: Wake up to coffee aroma and breakfast buffet before heading out.
lodging.lodgingStep2Desc: Your guide picks you up for the day
lodging.lodgingStep3Desc: Return to a hot sauna and outdoor tub under the stars.
lodging.lodgingStep4Desc: Share stories over a homemade dinner and plan tomorrow.
